frontmatter.title: Tether a High Speed Transfer Server to Aspera on Cloud

internal.content:
--- title: Tether a High Speed Transfer Server to Aspera on Cloud hiddenFromSearch: true --- ### IBM Cloud Private (ICP) Pre-Deployment --- In this video you will learn: - How to locate the install media on passport advantage (with product codes) - How to load the ICP installation images into Docker - How to configure the ICP hosts file - How to add the clusters SSH key to the ICP deployment package NOTE: These tasks must be completed before you install ICP for a successful deployment. --- --- export default ({children}) =>
{children}
[![MCM](../../../images/SWAT_Header.gif)](https://ibmintegration.github.io/cp4mcm-swat-kb/)
